choices: An 8 year old boy chooses you.
A 13 year old boy chooses you.
1.content:
Bob Westly applied for work at a toy store he had never even knew was in town. He saw the help wanted ad in the local newspaper for a position in sales. As he entered the store, he noticed it was virtually empty of customers. The decor was mostly doll accessories as far as he could see, with a few of what looked like GI Joe play sets. He called out for help, and heard shuffling in the back of the store. Out walked an old man with a kind face, who asked how he could be of assistance. Bob told the man he was here for the job, if it hadn't been taken yet. The man smiled broadly and introduced himself as Mr. Franz, the owner of the store. Mr. Franz asked him to join him in the back room and they would discuss his credentials. As Bob talked of the places he worked before, embellishing a bit here and there, Mr. Franz was curiously looking him up and down. He even put his hand on his shoulder and gave him a brisk shake. Bob found this a bit odd, but assumed it was to see if he could haul the big boxes that he noticed in this back room. After a bit, Bob asked if he had the job. Mr. Franz, who had been silent all the while, looked up and smiled.

"You'll do fine," he smiled. Bob was relieved. The old man may seem eccentric, but seemed to be a kind man. "Now, if you'll come this way", the old man continued," I would.....like to take your picture....for my records." Mr. Franz led Bob to a spot in front of the strangest camera he had ever seen. As Bob stood there, the old man got behind the device and a strange grin now covered his face. "You'll do just fine....." There was a flash of light, a strange sensation and then darkness.

The next thing Bob Westly knew, he tried opening his eyes but the light was intense and took a minute for his sleepy eyes to adjust. His limbs felt heavy and wouldn't move. Did he faint? How long had he been out? Where was he? His eyes finally were able to see, but his confusion went unresolved. He saw the storeroom he was in, but things looked off kilter. And it seemed as though he was behind glass. Bob tried to move but couldn't. He assumed it was from his limbs being asleep, but he was beginning to panic. His eyes searched from side to side, but all he saw was an empty storeroom, and this glas surrounding him. He forced his head to inch down, so he could see toward his feet. He saw that he was naked! What happened to his clothes?! He was nude all but a loosely hung white cloth tied around his waist like a small bathroom towel. He instinctively tried to raise his hands to cover himself, but his arms still refused to move. Had the seemingly nice old man drugged him?! What had he done to him....? He noticed a big "F" embroidered on the cloth. His head was getting heavy and it was forced back to it's front facing position. For the first time since waking, he tried to scream. But nothing came. He couldn't speak either!

For an hour Bob stood there, unable to move in his glass prison. Panic had left him a bit and he was now focusing on trying his damnedest to move or speak. Suddenly he heard sounds from the front of the store. Again he tried to scream for someone to hear him. But then he wondered if it was the damn Mr. Franz, and anger mixed with fear came over him. He heard the door open to the storeroom and what he saw enter shocked him even beyond his already frozen state....it was Mr. Franz, but he looked huge! It must be the glass tricking his eyes. While he was there, he never took a better look at his surroundings. Now that he was, he noticed everything looked strangely large. Mr. Franz looked his way and gave him his familiar kind smile. "Ah, I see you are up now." he said. He walked a bit closer and was beginning to loom over him now. "Just in time too, as I have a customer that would love a new toy." The old man went back to the door and asked someone to come into the room. Bob couldn't see the door from his position, but heard the conversation...

"My boy can have any one he wants? No strings attached?" he heard a man say. One what?

"Oh yes, they are all up for sale." he heard Mr. Franz reply. "As long as you have the money, he can have whatever he wants."

"It's all here," the strange man replied, "one million. Go on son, look at them and make a decision."

"I trust you had no problem with the containment unit I sold you last week?" came Franz's kindly voice. "You bought the size 12 style so you will want to choose from these ones here."

"Good. What if we decide we don't like that size?" asked the man. "Oh, you can return and we will change the size...for an additional fee of course." the old man assured him. What was happening?! What size? Then the next thing that encompassed Bob's vision made his blood run ice cold...!
1.title: A job request.

11.content:
There before Bob Westly was the huge face of a child looking in on him! A boy of about 8 or 9! But he was a giant! Bob tried to move or scream, but again he was frozen! The boy looked at him and moved on. What did that damn old man do to him?! He shrunk him?! That's not possible! And yet here he was.... The boys face returned to his container, and smiled. He had brown tussled hair and big brown eyes. He peered even closer till his face was an inch from the glass. His breath began to fog up the glass.

"Did you find one Billy?" the man's voice rang out. The man was apparently his father. Soon he was standing behind the boy staring in from above.

"You're sure they're healthy. I'm not paying for one that can't keep up with my son."

"I assure you Mr. Kendal they are most satisfactory." Mr. Franz now joined them looking in at the frightened Bob. "Oh this one I just acquired Thursday. He is a fine specimen. Young Billy will have a wonderful time with him.

"Do they behave?" this brought a shiver down Bob's spine. "I want them to do whatever my son wants."

"Oh they will soon learn their place...with a little discipline." Mr. Franz gave a stern look at Bob. His smile returning he leaned down to the boy and said, "You like this one Billy?"

"Yes, sir." replied the boy. Looking up at his dad, "Can I have him daddy? Please!" Bob couldn't believe it...he was being sold to a giant boy! He fought to remain conscious and not blackout again.

"Ok Mr. Franz," answered the man, "we'll take him." The boy clapped his hands and smiled. Soon Bob's world was jostled and was moving. He was being carried by the old man to a counter where the money was left. The two men exchanged, shook hands, and the deal was done. Mr. Franz handed the container to Billy who now held it in both hands as he walked to the car out back. All the while staring in at the terrified Bob. Billy got into the car and sat in the backseat as his dad drove. "I can't wait till I get home so I can play with him!" he said. "Thanks daddy!" The man looked into the rearview mirror and smiled. "Anything for my boy. Since I'm always so busy, now you have someone to play with." The boy beamed, and returned to looking at Bob from every angle. "Can I take him out?" the boy asked. "Not till we get home. I don't want him loose in the car." 'So I can move,' Bob thought! 'This container must be keeping me immobile.'

Soon they reached the home of the man and boy. The boy jumped out and bee-lined for the house. "Hold it, son..." the man called out, "you need to put your bike away like I asked before you can play with your new toy." Bob screamed in his head 'I'm not a toy!'. Billy groaned and placed Bob on the front step and went to put his bike away. As Bob stared out his tube, he noticed how huge everything was. The yard seemed to go on for miles and the plant life was alien and foreign to him now. If he did escape, where could he go? He had judged that he was somehow 12" tall. If he ever was able to get his hands on that old man, he'd kill him! Billy soon returned and snatched Bob up rather roughly and ran through the house. The house went by like a blur.....
11.title: Bought!

113.content:
Billy continued to run and ran into a room and shut the door. He walked over and placed Bob on his dresser. He looked at him through the glass. "This is my room." he told his new toy. "My name is Billy, what's yours?" He waited a second then realized he forgot to take him out for him to answer. "Guess I need to take you out..." he reached up and began fiddling with the top. Finally, Bob thought! Maybe he could reason with this giant boy. Bob heard a hiss like an airlock and felt his weight return to his legs. Billy took the tube and gently laid it on it's side. The boy watched with wide eyes as the tiny figure began to crawl out. This was the first time he had seen him move, and he was fascinated by it! Billy watched as the tiny person before him stood up, and adjusted the small handkerchief around his waist. Bob looked up into the giant's eyes and was shocked. He was staring into the boy's eyes and he into his. The regarded each other for a second and then Bob regained his voice. "Y-you have to help me kid....th-this is crazy!" The boy found the wonder of him being able to speak a new delight.

"What's your name?" Billy asked.
"Bob..." answered the tiny man. "Bob Westly....look kid..." he tried to continue.
"Hi, Bob.", smiled the boy. "We are gonna have a bunch of fun together!"
"I'm not a toy, Billy," Bob pleaded, "I'm a man! I need your help. What Mr. Franz did was wrong. You have to help me!
"You're gonna need better clothes though...", the boy said, obviously not paying attention. The boy reached up and pinched a corner of the cloth around Bob's waist. "This is no good." Billy began to tug on the cloth and Bob grabbed the material. "Billy, no!" The boy stopped. He laughed "What's the matter? Shy?" He stopped tugging on the cloth. "Let me show you your new home, Bob." Billy reached a hand toward Bob with the obvious intention of picking him up. Bob screamed and backed away. Billy paused a moment and realized he scared the little man. The giant boy giggled and continued to move his hand slowly towards the tiny man. Bob's eyes were fixed on the huge hand moving towards him. He could hear the boy giggling the whole time as he chased the new toy around the dresser top. Soon the boy had him cornered at the edge. "Now where you gonna go little guy?" Billy made a move and wrapped his fingers around Bob's waist. This contact made Bob finally realize the horrible situation he was in. A toy for a giant boy. He then screamed to be put down and kicked his legs. Billy lifted him up and watched the tiny person in his grasp. He began to laugh at Bob's antics and suddenly realized his own situation. He now had a tiny man that was his to do with as he pleased. No longer having to listen to this particular adult. He was the adult here!

Billy carried the kicking and screaming man across the room to his new home. He placed Bob down in a room that appeared to be his size. Bob quickly scurried to the farthest corner of the room with eyes never leaving Billy. Billy knelt down and looked in. The room was sparsely decorated. was one room with a bed, chair and table, and a nightstand with a light. What also caught his eye was that in the same room was a toilet that faced, what he now noticed was a glass wall that was the whole front of the room. Billy was now looking in through the glass front at his captive. "Do you like it?", he asked. His reply was Bob pleading to be let out, which Billy just giggled at. There was another disgrace to be had....seeing the toilet made little Bob realize he had to go...badly. "I need to go to the bathroom." he yelled. A broad smile crossed Billy's face. The boy tapped on the glass in front of the toilet. "I'm not going in there! Let me out!", Bob demanded. "Then I guess you don't go, little guy.", came Billy's response. "But you better not go anywhere else in there or I'll have to punish you." Bob shook at the words he was hearing. Which in turn made him need to go even more.

Bob slowly walked over to the toilet. He examined it and found it to be basically a Dixie cup with a drain. There was no seat, so he had no idea how to sit on it. He would have to stand. He looked at the huge face watching his every move with wide-eyed wonder. "I need privacy! Turn around!", Bob yelled angrily. Billy smiled and shook his head. "Nope. I wanna see." He giggled more, but never left eye contact. Bob refused to be humiliated like this. But his bladder was overflowing. Who knows how long he was in suspended animation by that damn Franz! Finally he had to go NOW. Bob lifted up his cloth enough to go, but still tried to hide his privates from the boy. He began to urinate into the cup-toilet, and felt a rush of relief. He opened his eyes to see Billy giggling. Bob's face ran deep red. Billy edged closer to the glass and tilted his head sideways to try and see up the cloth at where the tiny stream was coming from, but Bob positioned himself to avoid it. When he was done Bob backed away and pulled his cloth down. Billy groaned in disappointment at not seeing anything and the end of the show. "That was fun, Little Bob. I'll need to give you lots more to drink!" With this he laughed, and further embarrassed Bob.
113.title: Bob's new home.

1131.content:
Billy reached in and grabbed the little man again and carried him to his bed. He then sat down and placed little Bob on his lap, and turned on the TV. "We can watch TV for a while before we have to go to bed." Billy turned it to Cartoon Network. "Billy, you have to stop this and help me, please!", Bob cried. Billy looked down at him and began petting him like a pet. "It's OK, little guy. I won't hurt you. We will be best friends."

"Ill be your best friend, if I'm my old size too!" Bob reasoned.

" Nah, I like you better like this." Billy was soon stopped petting Bob, who was now inching off his lap. Soon he was sitting on the bed pretending to be watching the show. When he thought Billy was not paying attention he leaned over the side of the bed to get down. Billy looked down to a funnt sight. Little Bob was trying to lower himself down to the floor and his cloth was bunching up and was raised above his bare bottom. Billy laughed and rolled on the bed. When he got up he reached a hand over and pinched Bob's bare bottom. Bob squealed in shock, and fell down to the floor. His cloth had fluttered off him and he scrambled to grab it and cover himself. Billy watched the whole time laughing, until the cloth fell off his tiny toy. He watched as the little man covered his front, but not before Billy got a quick glimpse of something. Bob's tiny penis. For some reason this made Billy quiet. Seeing it interested him suddenly. Billy reached a giant hand and tugged on the loose fabric and pulled it off the little man. Bob yelled something in protest, but not before covering his front with hands. Billy sat down on the floor in front of Bob, staring at the little hands in front of his view. "Told ya you needed better clothes.", Billy said absently.

"Give me back my towel!", Bob roared. Billy's hand reached again for Bob, who shrunk back in fear.
1131.title: A little TV

11311.content:
Billy wrapped his fingers around Bob, who then began squirming and kicking. "No Billy! No!" he pleaded. "Put me down! Please!" Billy ignored the screams, but liked them all the same. If he wanted to, he could look, and there was nothing this little person could do about it. This sent a rush of power through him. Something at his young age has never felt before. He had to go on. The giant boy reached up and took one of Bob's wrists and pulled it away. He could see something, but not much with the other hand in the way. Billy pinned the arm behind Bob with his other hand, and reached for the second wrist. He stopped to look at Bob and see he was panicking. Billy grinned and went back to pulling back the other hand. After pinning both arms behind he looked at his prize. Bob was now completely red-faced and kicking madly. This can't be happening, kept being repeated in his head. This giant boy had him in full view and he was helpless. Billy looked at the flaccid penis between the kicking legs. It flopped side to side with the kicking and made him giggle at the sight. Billy wanted to touch it. For moment he thought that would be going too far and Bob would punish him....then he remembered the situation. Who was to stop him. This little man was his. He slowly brought up a finger. Bob saw this and struggled harder. The giant finger came to rest on the tiny limp penis. Flaccid it was as long as the tip of his finger. He placed his fingertip under it and gently flopped it about. Bob could feel the finger invade his area, but there was nothing he could do. Billy brought his thumb up and ever so gently squeezed it. It was soft. Billy knew what he was doing was wrong, but it was too much fun. Billy let go of the penis and wasn't sure but thought it looked a little bigger on his finger. It was. It was now longer than his fingertip. He thought this was strange, but dismissed it. Bob was absolutely aware of it getting bigger. The ministrations of the giant boy's thumb has aroused his member. He was deeply mortified and ashamed. He just wanted it to stop!

After a little while of gazing at it, Billy got up from the floor and set Bob in his glass fronted house. Billy dropped the cloth onto the trembling little man. "That was fun, Bob. I'll make that our new game." Bob would have refused but he was tired and spent from kicking and screaming. Bob wrapped the cloth loosely around his waist and crept to the bed and sobbed. Billy could hear the sobbing and was suddenly sorry for doing it, but a side of him was extremely excited at what he had done. And he knew he would do it again. Billy walked away and went downstairs. He was still confused as to how the little penis had gotten bigger. He would have to look into that next time. He saw his dad sitting at the dining room table going over papers from work. Billy hugged him and thanked him for the new toy. "So, you two are getting along?", the dad asked.

"Yeah, he's real fun to play with. He's kinda shy though." Billy replied.

"I'm sure he'll come around sooner or later.", his dad assured him.

"His name's Bob....but I just call him Little Guy." Billy laughed.

"Well, you have a whole day planned for tomorrow I'm sure. Remember I have to leave for an hour or so tomorrow. Will you be OK here till then?"

"Yup. I'll just play with Little Guy. Goodnight Daddy."

"Goodnight son."

Billy walked back upstairs and checked on Bob, who was now asleep. Billy changed into his pajamas. He sat on his bed and thought for a moment on the penis growing thing. He opened his elastic and looked at his. He brought a hand down and squeezed it. Nothing. He shrugged and went to sleep.
11311.title: Curious

113111.content:
The next morning Billy woke up, almost forgetting about his new toy. He rubbed his eyes quickly and walked hurriedly to Bob's home. He looked in and saw that Bob was still asleep laying on his back. Billy reached a hand in to wake him...and stopped. He remembered last night and the game he played with him. The curiosity came flooding back. Billy slowly and carefully pulled back the little blanket, revealing the small man. The youngster then pinched a corner of the cloth around Bob's waist and tugged. Bob made a noise, and Billy stopped, eying the little man. But Bob just slept soundly again. Billy brought his other hand in and spread open the cloth. There again was the tiny man's privates, limp and flaccid.

Billy brought his face closer into the small room. He put a finger on it, and looked for a reaction from his toy. Nothing. He began to gently pet it with his huge fingertip. Then he pinched it softly between thumb and finger. It slowly began to wake up. He could feel it get bigger in his fingers. A smile crossed his face, 'Cool!' he thought. Billy stopped squeezing it and went back to stroking it with his fingertip. He was watching it get bigger in amazement. It climbed up Bob's thigh and pointed upward on his stomach. Billy's giant finger continued to tug on the skin of the shaft as he petted it. Suddenly Billy noticed something new.

There was something leaking out of the tip. First, he thought he was urinating, and Billy said "Eww..." quietly to himself. But he noticed it was clear. The giant boy took his fingertip off of the growing member and touched the clear stuff. He brought up his finger to his face and examined it. It was clear, thick, and slippery. He had no idea what it was, but he was fascinated. Billy looked back down at the little man and began spreading the stuff on the penis. It was everywhere, and when he went back to pressing down and petting the little piece, it made wet sloppy noises. Bob began to moan softly, and Billy saw a smile cross his face. "He likes this!" he thought. Soon the tiny penis was as big as Billy thought it would get, but he wanted to see it get bigger. He, again, wrapped his finger and thumb around it and began gently squeezing it and releasing it. Billy's fingers were covered in the clear stuff, and the penis began to throb and twitch. The head of the little penis was now peeking out from between the two massive digits holding it. Billy began to make small up and down motions on the shaft.

Soon he let go and watched it bounce up and down on his giant fingertip, and giggled. Bob was rustling in his sleep, moaning. "It must feel good...." Billy surmised. Billy brought his thumb down again and began stroking it with it on top of his finger. The twitching grew more rapid and suddenly it exploded. Billy watched stunned as the little man's penis shot out long spurts of white stuff all over his chest and Billy's fingers. It was even on the toy's chin. Billy sat in shock at this new revelation. He saw the once bigger penis slowly shrink and go back to normal. He looked at the stuff on his fingers closely. He sniffed it. Nothing. Played with it between his fingers. It was like the other stuff, only white. He dabbed some on his tongue. It tasted odd, but not bad. He shrugged and looked back in at the little man. He was still asleep, and sporting a big grin. Billy covered him back up and went downstairs to get some food.
113111.title: The Discovery

1131111.content:
Bob was rustled from his slumber by the noise of the bedroom door shutting. He almost forgot where he was, but the plain room with it's glass wall looking out forever to a giant-sized room made reality rush back. He instinctively grabbed the cloth around his waist and looked around for the child giant. He didn't see him, but he noticed something else. His groin and chest were sopping wet and sticky. Had he ejaculated in his sleep? He was reminded of the invasion of the night before, but that ended before he came. He remembered trying to fight the giant off, but to no avail. His body had betrayed him. He knew it was wrong, but his body didn't seem to care. In fact he was, for a second when Billy finished with him, disappointed he didn't get release. Had his subconscious mind done it for him? It was embarrassing. As Bob sat on the bed trying to wipe away the mess, he heard the footsteps of his "owner". Soon he saw the enormous door open and the impossibly huge child enter the room. He was carrying a plate in his hand.

"Hi Little Guy," Billy said as he saw his pet was up. "I brought food. You hungry?" Billy, not waiting for an answer placed the plate on the table beside the 'house'. From the larger plate he took a smaller one and placed it on the floor of the tiny room. As the giant hand retreated, Bob saw a plate with pancakes and bacon...but his size. Not giant sized. Franz must have sold them some sort of miniaturized food as well. Bob looked up at his captor and shook his head. He had no real appetite. He got up from the bed and walked toward the glass wall, adjusting the loose cloth around his waist. "Billy, where is your dad?" he thought maybe to reason with the adult.

"Dad's at work. And then he's coming home kinda late. So it's just us today." the youngster said with obvious glee. Bob's heart sank. So much for that idea...for now. Billy ate a little from his plate, and then reached a giant hand into the room to grab the tiny man.
1131111.title: Morning Guilt?

11311112.content:
Bob winced as the giant fingers wrapped strongly around his body. He was lifted up and set down on the table next to Billy's plate. The boy continued to eat from his plate while fidgeting with his captive man. Mostly he just petted his head with his fingertip. Soon Billy, to the tiny man's despair, was ready to play. The giant put aside the plate and focused on the tiny man.

"What should we do today?" he asked. More to himself then to an answer from Bob. Billy's finger traced down Bob's form and began to fiddle with the little person's groin. Bob gasped as he felt the huge finger play with his private area again.
11311112.title: Not Again....

113111121.content:
Bob decided to change the subject from anything that might bring on more 'playing'. "Billy, how is it there is food my size? Did Franz give you miniaturized food?" Billy thought for a second and answered. "No", he said, "he gave us a thing to make it......mini-ized." The tiny man's face lit up. "You have a size machine here?!"
"Uh-huh. It's cool!", Billy said. "Dad let me use it too. But I gotta be careful or I might end up like you." Billy poked a finger into Bob's ribs giggling. Bob barely noticed. "Does it grow as well?!" he exclaimed. Billy got a puzzled look on his face. "I guess it can. I never seen it do that though." he said.
"Billy, you can grow me back!" Bob yelled. "Ple-.."
"No way!" the giant boy broke in. "I like you. You're fun." The boy seemed to ponder something to himself. All the while Bob screaming to reason with him. Billy snapped out of his daze and looked down at the tiny man yelling on the table. "Hey, if I use that thing on some other person I can have more toys!"
Bob's blood ran cold. He couldn't do this to another person! What sort of idea had he inadvertently put in this boy's head? "Billy, you can NOT do that! It's wrong!" He pointed to himself, "THIS is wrong!"
"But you won't be lonely if I get some more toys." Bob ran to the boy's arm and pounded on his soft forearm. "No! Damn it! You can't!" Billy looked down and a frown crossed his face. He reached over and grasped the tiny man and brought him to face level. The shrunken Bob was flailing wildly. "Listen you," the boy started, "I WANT more toys. You can't tell me what to do Little Guy." With that he shook the man bit, to drive home his point. Billy ignored the ranting of his man, and placed him back in his house. "I'll be back. With a new toy to play with." Bob ran to the glass wall and began pounding it. "Billy no! Stop!"
113111121.title: An Idea is Formed

choices: Billy decides not to do it
1131111211.content:
Billy walked out the front door of his house. His house was actually more of a mansion. His father did very well. It's how he was able to afford Bob in the first place. As he walked down the long winding driveway, he tried to think of a way to get more toys. He'd show that dumb Bob. He'd have to punish him later. But now...how would he get more people? When he got to the gate, the answer presented itself....
"Hi Billy." He was Danny Bradford. A friend from the neighborhood. "Watcha doin?" he asked as he saw his friend from through the gate. Danny was 12 years old, but got along great with him anyway.
"Nothin'..." Billy replied almost with obvious guilt. He liked Danny. They'd been friends ever since his family moved here. His family wasn't nearly as rich as his, they went to different schools even. But they saw each other in the park alot. Billy even spent the night at his house once. 'I bet Danny'd think it was fun. Not like Bob. All Bob does is gripe.' he thought. He liked the idea. "Wanna come in and play my new 360?" Billy asked. "Sure!" Danny yipped. Billy opened the gate and they walked to the house, Danny chattering on about games.
As they entered the house, Billy walked to the room with the device. Danny, having only been in the house a few times before, just followed along talking his head off about how bad he heard Perfect Dark Zero was. When they entered the room, Danny finally quieted when he saw the machine. It was big and took up alot of space. "Hey, what's THAT?" Danny asked. "It makes toys." Billy replied. "Makes toys?.....How?" the boy asked.
"You lie here," Billy pointed to the flat surface on the machine, "and it makes a toy of you."
"Like an action figure?!" Danny said excitedly.
"Kinda.....wanna do it?" Billy asked nervously.
"Um....does it hurt?" Danny asked looking at the foreboding machine.
"Nah, it'll be fun." Billy pushed Danny over to the machine. Danny was a little nervous now. "Lay down here."
"I don't know, Billy.....let's just play 360."
"Later. Come on...." Peer pressure on his side, Billy got Danny onto the table. He skipped to the controls and began turning it on. It gave a low almost inaudible hum, that could be felt more than heard. Danny shifted on the table uncomfortably. In honesty, the machine's table was meant for small items like plates or clothes, and Danny's legs dangled over the edge. Billy was set to shrink his friend. Just one more button and he would have another little toy person. His finger hovered over the button...
1131111211.title: The Search for more Toys

11311112111.content:
Billy looked at his friend on the machine's table and smiled. "Time to make a toy..." he whispered. He pushed the button and a bright multi-colored beam shot from a spot above the table onto the boy. Danny squeeled in shock, and tried to get up. His limbs wouldn't move. He was paralyzed. His eyes darted around the room for a way out. He began to feel strange.
Billy watched as the beam hit his friend and began it's work. He had seen it shrink food, and that was fun. But now he was watching a real person being turned into a tiny doll. He didn't get to see Bob shrink, he had been that way when they got him. Now he saw it shrink his buddy smaller and smaller. "Cool....!" he said wide eyed.
Danny felt like he was moving. Moving away from everything. Everything was getting bigger and wider. He was yelling, but only in his head. His mouth was frozen. Before long the beam went away and he could move. His arms and legs felt heavy and he was tired. Like he'd just ran for P.E. class. He got to shaky feet and looked in shock at his surroundings. What happened to him? Then a shadow fell over him.
Billy watched as his friend stopped shrinking at the machine's pre-determined aspect ratio of Bob's size. He was so tiny. Smaller than Bob even. He watched him stumble to his feet and look around wildly. Billy walked over to where he was and knelt down. Danny slowly turned around and saw the giant boy for the first time. He yelled and stumbled backwards, landing on his butt. Billy smiled down at his new possesion. "Hi Danny. I told you it makes toys." with that the giant laughed. Danny covered his ears, but never taking his eyes off Billy. The giant kid frowned, "Hmm...I'll be right back." He walked out of the room with ground shaking footsteps, making Danny cringe. The shrunken boy was trying to figure it all out. Escape wasn't even crossing his confused mind yet. Soon the giant returned and dropped a shrunken bath towel next to the tiny boy.
"You need to change. This is what my toys wear." Billy said. He watched as Danny looked at the towel and then up at him, then back to the towel. He was almost in tears by now. "Go on. Change." he ordered. Danny's senses returned enough to shake his head.
11311112111.title: Danny Shrinks

113111121111.content:
"Fine, I'll do it for you." Billy reached down and snatched the tiny boy before he knew what was coming. Danny instantly began to scream and kick. The feeling of power that Billy loved returned as he held the small boy in his hand. He watched his little legs kick and his arms swing, and he giggled. In that way, she was envious of plastic dolls. Damn, she thought, she was viewing herself as his doll. Moreover this thought didn’t make her sick. After several minutes, Debbie was so relaxed that she was beginning to nod off. She was stirred to alertness by a knock at the door.

“One minute,” yelled Debbie, not sure if her tiny voice was heard.

She climbed out of the sink and wrapped herself in the towel. The door cracked and Marta peeked her head in.

“How are you doing, Mrs. Bradford?”

“I am doing great, Marta. Why did James send you?”

“He didn’t want to intrude on your privacy, but he wanted to give you these night clothes.” Marta had them pinched between two fingers. She lowered them into Debbie’s hands.

Debbie rubbed her hands over the clothes, they were soft and warm. Certainly not what she expected from doll clothes. “Are these doll clothes, Marta?”

Debbie hugged the clothes to her chest. “Marta, give me a few minutes and then send James in.”

“Yes ma’am.” Marta closed the door.

Debbie finished drying off and pulled on the night clothes. She hugged herself in the clothes. She wondered where the night would go next.

“What are you talking about?” James asked.

“You know damn well. Why are you acting this way? I thought you were happy with me.” Debbie had a frown on her face.

She then walked over and began to stop and jump on the tiny domicile, tears streaming down her face. In seconds, it was rubble and that rubble embedded into the mud. Nadine rushed over and hugged her tightly. “It’s ok, Sara. Everything is ok now. We have each other. Sara, I love you.”

Sara lifted Nadine’s chin with her hand and kissed her. Returning to the hug, she savored the moment until it was time to move on. “You have me forever, don’t you?” Sara asked.

“Forever and always, you will never want again.” Nadine promised.

—-

Approaching school, Sara turned to Nadine and held both her hands. “Baby, I don’t think we should kiss or hold hands at school. Let’s keep these moments to ourselves.”

“I agree sweetie,” said Nadine, “We don’t need their judgement.”

Sara nodded. She hesitated a moment, “We should also...uh...try...to rescue Missy from Rufus. You know, if we see the opportunity.”

Nadine looked at Sara flatly, “Are you sure?”

“Yeah...” Sara paused, “We might not restore her right away. She could be our pet. But I don’t want Rufus chafing his dick off,”

“Or Missy getting hurt?” Nadine offered.

“Yeah, that too.”

“I don’t see Rufus during the day,” Nadine stated.

“I see him after third period. I’m certain he will have her with him.” The two pecked and set off.

—-

The day quickly passed until third period arrived. Sara found Rufus sitting by himself. He was smiling ear to ear.

“Hey Rufus...” Sara said.

Rufus immediately looked suspicious, “What does the queen of the cheerleaders need with me? Don’t mess with me, or my friend will resolve it.”

Sara sat down next to Rufus. “Rufus, we have the same friend. I do not mean you any trouble. I did want to talk about Missy.”

Rufus pulled back, “I know nothing about that blonde meanie.”

Sara looked sympathetic, “I know what trouble she caused you.”

“How can someone as beautiful as you possibly know?” Rufus spat.

“Rufus...” Sara paused, “I’m gay. Missy threatened to expose me. I confided this in Nadine. She saw her attacking you for having a little crush on her. She gave you Missy to play with, right?”

Rufus looked at his knees, “Yes, and I had a lot of fun with her. She is resting now.”

“You have to give her to me. We have to restore her.”

“I don’t want to lose my favorite thing!” Rufus exclaimed.

“I know, but it isn’t right. This is slavery.”

“It’s justice,” Rufus’s eyes were narrowed.

“Justice is when the scales are balanced. Her being mean and rude doesn’t deserve a lifetime at the size of a toy, being sexually assaulted.”

Rufus looked sad, “You are right. So you are going to take her back to Nadine?”

“Yes, Rufus.”

Rufus unceremoniously reached up his pant leg and extracted Missy from her confinement in his underpants. Her hair was a mess, she was coated in spunk and several large welts had appeared. Sara held out a half filled water bottle and Rufus dropped her in.

“Missy take a couple of deep breaths,” Sara stated. She paused until she saw the small woman breathe several times. Then she closed the lid on the bottle and vigorously shook it. She then poured the water out into the grass.

Sara smiled at Rufus and patted him on the knees, “You did the right thing.”

Rufus nodded. As Sara began to get up, Rufus yelled, “Wait!”

“What’s up?”

“If I found someone who wanted to be my toy, would Nadine help me?”

“I am certain she will. She is an amazing person who just wants people to be happy.” Rufus’s smile returned.

Sara crosses the quad and found another quiet corner. Opening the water bottle, she stared down at the wet, but clean, blonde.

“Thank you so much,” Missy praises, “You have know idea what it was like to be that nerd’s sex toy.”

Sara reached in and poked Missy onto her butt. “Perhaps you need more time with him. You haven’t learned the lesson.”

“You mean that freaks like you can also be horrible people?”

Sara popped the bottle causing Missy’s face to smash into the bottle. Her nose was bloodied.

“My girlfriend was happy to leave you with Rufus until his grandkids were learning how to fuck with your action figure body, bitch. I was the one who felt bad. The one who felt one bad turn deserves another....You know, I don’t know why you hate so much, who has hurt you?”

“Just now you did. Are all you lezs this dumb?”

Sara imagined dropping Missy on the ground and smashing her. It would be satisfying for a moment, but then it would be gone. She would then haunt her dreams. So Sara took the higher road, closing the bottle and dropping it in her bag.

The rest of the day passed peacefully. After school, Nadine and Sara found one another and embraced before walking home together.
1131111211111111122111111111111111111111.title: Nadine and Sara go to school

1131111211111111122111111111111111111111.content:
In the dark and silence, Kristin dozed. With the normal hustle and bustle of her life, it was actually nice to chill in a place with low lights and little sound. The wooden walls almost made it feel like a cabin in the woods. The illusion could be broken by the lack of windows and the plastic Star Wars themed furniture, but she decided to look past this.

Late in the afternoon, her serene environment ended. There was a large crash followed by a thud. There was further sound of movement and the bass vibrations that accompanied a skyscraper-sized form moving around. He was coming closer. The scraping sound of a giant chair pierced the sky, followed by the light of an artificial sun pouring into her cabin.

Unnerving as always, a giant smiling face peered down. “Hello dolly, I hope you had a good day. Would you like to come out?”

Kristin was surprised that she wasn’t just snatched up. This human clearly had the means. It wasn’t until she nodded that a table sized hand appeared. Kristin clapped the shoulder of the Leia figure that she shared a snowspeeder ride with, “Later sister, just keep the flame for Solo, he’ll come around.” Danny giggled at this interaction. Kristin climbed onto the hand and sat cross legged.

Danny’s other hand came down and rotated her so his thumb could clamp her waist. “Better safe than sorry, Red.” Kristin paused, he clearly was referring to her hair. She loved that redheads in movies were referred to as Red. It’s charm worked here too.

Danny slowly lifted her skyward until she was near his face. He gave her a quick peck on the cheek. “I have a little surprise for you, Red. I realize the toy box isn’t much fun. You also deserve more than what Bob gets because you didn’t ask to be shrunk.”

“Bob asked to be shrunk?” Kristin asked incredulously.

“Yes, this was apparently a job for him. He didn’t read the job description close enough. Anyway, I found you a home on Craigslist. Someone was selling this beautiful Victorian dolls house. It’s just your size!” Danny sat Kristin down in front of it. She was in awe. It was a two story Tudor. She ran from room to room. The house was fully furnished with working lights and doors. No running water though. Aside from no water, it was the house she imagined her soulmate would buy her for their life together. She paused, this didn’t mean Danny was her soul mate, did it?

In a surreal moment, the back wall separated from the house and a giant hand scooped her up. She could help but shriek. Danny pulled her to his chest and stroked her head and back. “I’m sorry Red, I should have knocked first. I just wanted to show you that while you have full privacy, but I could help you whenever through the wall.” Kristin calmed down. “Was their anything you needed straight away?”

Kristin beamed, “It’s perfect but for one thing. I need my homegirl Leia with me. No reason why my copilot can’t live an upgraded lifestyle too.” Kristin also thought seeing the doll will help not let her mind flip back to normal size mode so quickly.

Danny giggled, “Sure, I’ll move her in tonight! Let’s have our snack.”

Danny turned on the TV to a kid’s science show and sat Kristin on his plate. She was a bit unnerved by this, her thoughts returned to the image of him tonguing her into his mouth. She calmed down with the thought he wouldn’t have bought her a dollhouse to just eat her as a snack. He also wouldn’t have chunked up a grape to her size for a snack. She felt Danny kiss her again on the top of her head. This kid certainly liked having her around. He seemed to be trying to take care of her, in a kid type way, but she appreciated the effort nonetheless. If she was forever stuck this size, there were certainly worse situations to be placed in.

The two munched their fill of grapes. Then Danny served them both water from his water bottle. Kristin appreciated the no spill spout. Had that not been there, she was certain she would have taken an unintended bath. She did feel dirty though. Maybe later she would ask Danny to give her a real bath. Maybe in the claw foot tub he bought her in the doll house.

The show ended and Danny exclaimed, “Let’s do what they did.”

Kristin hadn’t paid the billboard sized TV any mind, it was too big to take in. “What are we doing?”

Danny spud around and pulled out a sheet of paper. He sat Kristin down and gently pressed her onto her back. “They were measuring each other. I want to measure you, Red.”

“Uh...sure,” said Kristin. That seemed harmless enough.

Danny pulled out a ruler and positioned it on top of her. He pinched her feet in his fingers so they pointed vertically, “No cheating from pointed toes missy,” he giggled. He studied the markings on the ruler. “You are three and 7 of 8 inches tall!” he exclaimed. Kristin never felt smaller.

Danny realized his other measurements needed more precision. He pulled out a caliper that he used for model building and set off to collect every other measurement he could think of - finger length, toe nail size, width of breast to areola, length of vaginal lips.

On and on, Danny measured and every casual touch or stroke brought Kristin closer to her edge. This boy wasn’t trying to, or even realized he could, but he was making her hornier than anyone ever had. When he measured the length of her thumbnail, she reached a peak.

“Danny, you may not understand, but I need to release some energy.”

Danny sat back concerned, “What did I do wrong?”

Kristin purred back, “It’s not what you did wrong, it’s what you did right. Women love the attention of their man. Here.” She beckoned for his hand. Danny sheepishly extended a finger. Kristin guided it to her blueberry sized breasts. “Slowly circle your fingers over your toy, Danny.” He hesitated at first, but the sight of her beginning to squirm gave him confidence. “Very...good...giant...” she squeezed out breathlessly.

With her head swimming, Kristin pulled up her legs and moved a hand between them. Danny watched enthralled has Kristin opened herself as she stroked and moaned. “Wow, I bet Sid doesn’t know there are two sets of vaginal lips!” Kristin chuckled as she continued forming a puddle on Danny’s desk.

The writhing continued until Danny felt Kristin tense up and then release. Every muscle in her body relaxed. Danny withdrew his fingers from her chest. He noticed they were a bit red from the attention. She motioned with her hand for Danny to come closer. “Kiss my breasts, boy. Show them love for the torture you inflicted.” Danny smiled and kissed her chest as commanded. With a little suction, he drew both breasts in between his lips and he gave them a quick flick with his tongue. The tiny nubs of her nipples, that he only barely felt with his fingertips, were more noticeable with his tongue. They had a tingly taste that he enjoyed.

Pulling back from her. Danny grabbed some nearby wet wipes, and cleaned her front off. Lightly pinching both calves, he lifted her up her legs to expose her tush. He wiped her bottom as well. She was dozing by this point.

Figuring it was time to give her some privacy, he carried her over to the doll house and laid her in the master bedroom. There he covered her in a tiny blanket.

“Thank you, giant, for being so kind to me.”

Danny lovingly stroked her whole body over the blanket, “you make it easy, Red, to love you. Sweet dreams.”

She heard Danny leave and return with Leia, placing her in the chair next to the bed. Then she heard the back wall restored. After that, she didn’t hear anything for a while.

1131111211111111122111111111111111111111.content:
Around town, excitement always built before the home high school games. It really was a community affair. Many people without students at the school routinely joined in to the experience. As such, being at the game was a good way to be seen. Boys who played on the team were often recruited to good schools. Girls often found solid work after high school. Many cheerleaders ultimately became models or actresses.

Given her broken home life, Sara became a cheer leader for her ticket out. With her father drinking what little he made, there was no way he would be able to support her aspirations to leave. Additionally, the few moments he wasn't drunk he would try to pressure her to stay. He would even compare her desire to leave to her mom dying. Sara hated those moments the most. It was such a self-absorbed thought to think that someone would suffer for years with cancer just to leave.

As such, although Sara didn't really care much about football, positive energy or any of the things that one normally became a cheerleader for. She joined to be seen by a recruiter and put her most into it. She was good at it too. That made folks like Missy jealous. Then when Sara wouldn't take in the time honored tradition of laying the football team, she became a point of ridicule. In enters Nadine - her best friend as a child, who became her target to get in with the mean girls, now her lover and savior. She didn't deserve to be so lucky.

Not only was she lucky to know Nadine, Sara was lucky to love her. Sara thought Nadine dressed so hot for the game - her hair was pulled partially back and she was dressed like she was going to a Nirvana concert. Sara thought Nadine's plan of riding in her bra for half-time crazy. However, if her lover wants to see the world from the eyes of her boobs, how could she say no?

After a quick burger, the two made it to the field for warm-ups. Nadine was very particular with her doll. She plucked off every lint ball and straightened every crease. She went in for a kiss but Sara pushed back on her. With a flirtatious wink Sara stated "Honey, all your attention on me is making me feel hot too. Let's use this later." Sara could understand Nadine's desire - the sights and smells of the game, and all the young pheromones in the air were enough to drive anyone hog wild.

With one last sensual stroke of her forearm, Nadine stepped back and made her way to the stands. Half-way there, Nadine blew Sara a kiss. Nadine thought herself so lucky to bag the captain of the cheer leading squad.

For Sara, the football game was monotony. She fell into the groove of leading her team in crowd building as the football team steamrolled some small towns team. Mid-way though the second half, Sara felt a peculiar sensation in her belly that radiated outwards. Her skin almost felt like a balloon being blown up. Sure enough, it became clear that she was expanding as the rest of the world continued to contract.

To distract herself mostly, she called the team to perform a cheer number on the track. The girls at first didn't notice, but then saw that their captain was getting larger. As the cheer went on, Sara began switching it up, taking turns tossing and catching each of the other girls. She found she was even able to toss Abigail, the six foot tall cheerleader who normally tossed the other girls. She noticed how her hands felt on her teammates uniforms. At first she felt the normal woolen scratchiness but they got softer and softer with each toss.

Eventually, she determined that she could toss two girls at a time. Pausing, she plucked up Mary. The tiny girl, who stood at about four feet, was absolutely precious normally, but she was irresistible now. Her skin was baby soft and her hair felt a bit like velvet. Patting her chest, Sara's hand covered from belly button to shoulders. She could feel her petite A-cups against her palm. She wanted to strip her bare to examine her closer, but others were watching. She took the ribbon from her hair bow and tied her up. Then she slipped her into a pocket for later play time over Mary's protests. The tiny woman couldn't do anything about it. Sara was going to keep her. Nadine wouldn't mind another toy to play with. As each of the girls became handheld in size, they also found themselves either inserted into a pocket, or when her pockets became too full, inserted into her panties. Sara's excitement resulted in the girls adhered to the inside of her panties. The crowd was noticing the giant woman. Some of the men in the crowd were hollering for a show. Sara knew as cheerleader she needed to perform.

Sara palmed Abigail and Meredith, the two tallest girls, in her hand. They were the size of Barbie dolls to Sara. She brought them to her lips and kissed them both. Sara only took a moment to notice the terror in each of the girl's eyes. Then, as a juggler tosses bowling pins, both doll woman were used in an intricate display of juggling mastery. As they were flung, Sara found their clothes were bunching up and getting in the way of her catches, so she paused an moment to strip the women bare before proceeding. She also pulled out Mary for fun - to give some size variation. She tired of that quickly. She also tired of these people gawking at her. Cheer leading wasn't an outlet for her.

Sara returned the bundled Mary to her pocket, but found she was out of space for Abigail and Meredith. So, she shoved the screaming naked women into her bra. They tried to fight their way out, but they were held into the cups with Sara's massive mammaries. Stepping over to the sidelines, she scooped up the bench of the opposing team. A dozen or so boys clung to it for their life as it was hefted skyward. Then one boy at a time was plucked them from the bench and tossed like a lawn dart into the stands. The crowd began to disperse and Sara ran to stop them.

Reaching a group, she soccer kicked one football mom who was especially bitchy. The woman ended up passing through the uprights before splatting three hundred yards away. Sara began an end zone celebration that accidentally included stomping on several people. Snatching up one young boy, she squeezed him from his clothes like a grape. She flicked his member until it was hard. Showing the member to the crowd, she screamed, "I expect you want to see me suck his cock - as you know all cheerleaders are cum dumpsters. Well not this one, I like carpets to snakes." She plucked the penis from the boy and tossed it into her mouth, chewing before swallowing. She then spiked him into the ground and scooped up a prominent business woman. Plucking off her skirt and panties, Sara sucked on her like a candy.

Sara was about to reach for another woman when....

"Hey Sara, it's time to get ready for half-time," the smiling face of Abigail stood over her.

That daydream was vivid. She didn't expect her mind to go there, so it was quite an interesting thing to learn about herself. Sara lead her troop off the track and behind the stands to warm up for the half-time routine. Nadine ran up to her lover and gave her a hug. "Your first half was amazing! I can't wait for my ride." Sara couldn't wait either. That daydream had gotten her so worked up that she looked forward to being a giant. Having a body fill the space between her boob and bra was an experience she couldn't wait to have.

1131111211111111122111111111111111111111.content:
Talia had a long day. School was typically a chore for her, but beyond that she had some community service. It was coordinated by the French club. All seniors needed 20 hours of community service to graduate. This event fit her schedule, but that didn't make it any less back breaking. They were clearing and abandoned lot as part of a #trashtag project. Talia was a bit miffed that Nadine had the shrink ray with her. Talia could have made quick work reducing the large beams and other debris. It probably was just as well though. She may have decided to "keep" a few souvenirs. The French teacher was incredibly cute and her son was very handsome. She ensured she flirted with him and slipped him her number. She even got a chance to marvel at his muscles as he pulled one particularly large piece of trash. He seemed to like the way she stroked his bicep. Maybe he'll call and they could meet up.

Entering the house, Talia saw a distracted Marta sitting in the hall. It was the first time the two had come across one another since the tea party. Talia walked up next to her and put a hand on her shoulder. "How are you doing, Marta?"

The red in her eyes told Talia that Marta was still processing what occurred. Talia wrapped her arms around her and gave her a tight hug. Marta kissed Talia's cheek. "I'm sorry sweetie, I am just a bit preoccupied."

Talia stood up and stroked her cheek, "I'm here for you. The tea party did not go as I had planned. I am sorry for bringing you into it."

Marta forced a weak smile. "No no, I was happy to spend time with you. I know how you love being frilly and girly - very unlike your sister. I want to have that tea party with you at some point. To be as pretty as your dolls and to sit with them at the same table. Perhaps we just don't have any other guests next time."

"You're right. Others just don't get it. I look forward to that Marta. You were so pretty in your dress. Maybe we could play dress-up after the party."

Marta took Talia's hand in her own and squeezed. "Sounds great honey. Is there anything I can do for you."

"I want you to rest. I'm going to bring a snack to Mom, James and Amy."

Marta was confused, "Who's Amy?"

"Remember the pregnant woman in the gold dress?" Talia asked, "She has decided to stay with me."

Marta looked concerned, "Honey, you should let her go. I'm sure her family is very worried about her. That and the other woman...you know, the one who attacked me."

Talia patted her hand,"I took care of that red-headed bitch. You don't have to worry about her anymore. Besides, if I can't return them all to normal, I can't return any. Otherwise they'll lead the cops here. Right now, with them all gone, it is just a mystery for the ages."

Marta had to admit, as much as she hated to, that Talia was right. Talia skipped off to the kitchen.

In the kitchen, Talia busied herself making a tiny feast. She knew that her mom and James would likely have an opinion about Amy. So she readied herself for that conversation too. She prepared a miniature fruit salad, tiny bowls of french fry slivers, miniature steaks and tiny cocktails. She made for herself a steak sandwich, a normal sized bowl of fries and a cup of soda. Entering her room, she collected a Barbie sized table and chairs and placed them on her desk. She set the table for three. Then from the tiny bedroom, she collected the three occupants and sat them at the table. She placed her plate next to their table and sat down.

"Good evening everyone, I thought we could all use a good meal together!" said Talia joyfully.

"Talia, we need to talk about Amy..." James began but was interrupted by a log sized finger covering his mouth.

"Ssh...we will have time for that. I am sure you are all famished, please fill your bellies," she tickled Debbie's belly. "Especially you, since you are eating for too," Talia said stroking Amy.

The three sitting on the desk fell into an uncomfortable silence as they ate. Talia was fine with this, filling the void with all sorts of chatter about her day, her hopes, desires and plans. Shortly the little ones were finished and Talia had barely taken a bite. Noticing this, Talia scooped up Amy and cuddled her in her lap as she continued to talk and eat. Once they were fully done, Talia sat the table unto her plate and her plate onto the tray she used to carry items from the kitchen. Using a wet wipe, she cleaned off the tiny people and her own hands.

"Okay, I guess it is time to have this conversation. Can we move somewhere a touch more comfortable?"

James nodded. Talia scooped up all three and carried them to her bed. She propped up a pillow for James and Debbie to lean against. Using her normal pillow, she leaned against the wall. Amy sat between Talia's legs. Talia began to idly toy with Amy's feet, a bit nervous about what was coming next.

"Honey," James began, "We were surprised this morning by Amy's arrival. We want you to be happy, but we need to understand fully what has occurred. We heard Amy's side of the events, I want to hear about yours."

With one hand, Talia pulled Amy up to her chest and held her tight - almost like a human shield. With her other hand, she wiped away a few tears before composing herself. "I did not intend for anyone to get hurt. I just wanted to have a tea party. I remembered mom's friends had one weekly and thought I would crash it. But they wouldn't want a silly girl there, so I thought about just taking them home for the party. I didn't think much of it as you have Mom and Danny has Bob and Billy has got several people he plays with."

"Billy has several people?" James asked in shock. He shook his head, "We'll deal with him later."

Debbie had scooted over and was sitting next to her daughter's giant food. She stroked her big toe for reassurance. Talia appreciated the gesture from her tiny mother.

"So I collected the three women and brought them here with Wendy's gazebo. Marta stated she wanted to join my tea party, so she came along as well. Things kinda went off the rails after Marta began waking them up."

"Marta was involved?" James looked cross.

Talia fanned the air with her free hand. "No, no. She thought she was going to have a party with my stuffed animals. She didn't know I had shrunk anyone or expected me to shrink her. She was just helping after I shrunk her. I restored her after the incident, so she could address things."

"By incident, you mean when you killed Wendy," James asked for clarity.

Talia began to cry profusely. "James, if I may," said Amy from her hand perch, "As I mentioned, Talia didn't harm Wendy intentionally. It was an accident after Kristin wouldn't stop hitting Marta." Amy stroked the giant thumb of the hand holding her. She did feel bad for Talia, but that didn't stop her desire to get home.

"I think I know enough," James said, "Please restore Amy, so she can go home."

"I can't!" screamed Talia. "I don't have the size ray and even if I did, if I restore Amy there will be lots of questions. Even if Amy says nothing, questions will be asked. Questions that end in people learning I killed a sweet woman. I either restore everyone, or I restore no one, and I unfortunately cannot restore everyone."

A silence fell over the room.
1131111211111111122111111111111111111111.title: The Conversation

1131111211111111122111111111111111111111.content:
Sara rushed Nadine over behind the bushes. “Are you sure you want to do this? I don’t want to hurt you,” Sara asked with genuine concern.

The roar of the cheers and flapping of the pom-poms were almost deafening to tiny Nadine, but she loved the excitement and the crowd.

Nadine went with Sara on every move. She was glad she was firmly pressed into her. Any freedom of movement certainly would have caused injury, or at least significant discomfort, for the tiny human. Nadine felt a bit queasy, but she loved carnival rides that were much more violent than this.

As Sara landed her jump, a stray hand passed over her left breast. She was certain Nadine would be caught, but the routine continued without pause or any indication the team noticed anything wrong.

As the cheer ended, the band continued to their next set as the cheerleaders ran off field to cool of prior to the bottom half of the game. Just off field, Sara was approached by Derrick, one of the linebackers. Saying he was as dumb as a box of rocks insulted rocks.

“You were pretty out their, Sara. I would love a personal show some time.”

Sara tried to chuckle it off and she kept walking, “I’m sure you would Derrick but, trust me, you aren’t my type.”

Derrick grabbed her arm and spun her around, “Hey I am talking to you.”

“Let me go you meat for brains. I don’t consent.” Sara said flatly.

“Fine, your tits are too small for me anyway.” Derrick grabbed Sara’s left tit to show dominance. They both felt him grab Nadine. “What the hell is this?”

To that end, he ventured to the playroom for some decompression time of his own. In the hall outside the room, Danny found a water bottle that had clearly fallen from one of his sisters’ bookbags. Being a good brother, Danny scooped up he bottle and pivoted to go to the kitchen.

He jumped a smidge when the bottle faintly yelped. Afraid he disturbed a mouse, Danny curled up, bringing the bottle closer to his ear. The yelps became louder.

Peering into the bottle, Danny saw the outline of a figure banging the sides of the bottle. Danny adjusted the bottle slightly and the outline disappeared. In its place was a blob that slid to the bottom of the bottle.

Danny rushed to the kitchen to investigate. He didn’t want a mouse jumping out at him if one of his sisters deviously caught one and left it for him to find.

Entering the room, Danny placed the bottle on the counter. He collected a rolling pin to smash any rodents, a towel to collect any water and a clear glass to pour the bottle into.

Steeling himself, Danny inhaled one last time and cracked the lid on the bottle. He quickly overturned the bottle into the glass, with the rolling pin at the ready to smash everything.

The rolling pin clattered to the ground when Danny realized that the bottle contained a tiny blonde woman. His jaw was agape at the sight of the beauty.

At first Missy was stunned by the sudden flipping of her moist tubular home, but when she saw another giant boy staring at her, she balled herself as small as possible in the corner of this new glass. She had expected to be released after Sara saved her from Rufus, but Sara had forgotten her like a candy bar wrapper, allowing the water bottle prison to fall from her bag. Missy had blacked out from the fall, so she was not quite sure what time it was.

Danny was stunned by the streaks of blood on this blonde woman’s face. She must have been hurt in the bottle. She also appeared to have scratches and bruises on a lot of her body. His heart reached out to this doll.

He spoke in a very soft voice, “Hello dollie, my name is Danny. I don’t know who hurt you, but you are safe with me. What is your name?”

To date, Missy had little reason to trust giants, so she didn’t trust a claim of safety. So she remained quiet.

“It’s ok, dollie. I can see that others have hurt you. I certainly hope my sisters weren’t part of that, but I want to help you. I see you are dirty. So let’s clean you up and get you a bite to eat.”

The giant’s smile seemed sweet. Missy followed him through the glass walls as he plugged the sink and filled it with water. A giant hand encircled the glass and carried her to the sink. It tipped her from the glass into a waist deep pool of warm soapy water.

“I want to touch you dollie, but I don’t want to force you. Can I wash you?”

Missy was glad she was on the swim team. Although only chest deep, swimming like this is tiring. She heard the giant’s request, and it would be nice to be massaged by giant fingers, she wanted to test this boy’s commitment to help only. After all, he could just pluck her up and do whatever to her. Rufus certainly didn’t mind using her for whatever he wanted. So she shook her head no.

Danny smiled and nodded. He went to pat her head, but the finger froze midair and retreated. Missy smiled, perhaps the boy was different. Missy swam several laps in the makeshift pool. It was nice to stretch her body. She didn’t care that the boy watched and enjoyed the scene.

As the water started getting cold, she decided it was time to trust him some. She decided to let him wash her hair.

Finding her voice, she yelled to the giant, “If you want to help, wash my hair and just my hair.”

Danny jumped for joy at this request, causing Missy to stumble. He raised a hand to his mouth in the universal “uh oh” expression. Missy realized he didn’t intend to cause her to fall and gave him a thumbs up. Danny smiled again.

Taking a tiny dap of the hand wash at the sink, he smeared it between his index finger and thumb to lather it. He then carefully lowered it to the dolls head and slowly worked the soap. Her hair was so soft and silky. Danny was certain she had beautiful hair at full size, but at this size it was absolutely irresistible.

Danny found satisfaction in the still, content look that came over the doll’s face. He took the opportunity to look over of her parts that was above water. He had so many questions about how she got hurt, but now wasn’t the time to ask them.

Starting the warm water again, Danny used the sink spray hose to gently was away the soap. He then retracted his hands.

“Thank you,” remarked Missy, “Now, get me some food before emptying my pool.”

After a few minutes, Danny returned with a grilled cheese sandwich and olives, one corner of the sandwich was removed and cut into dollie bite size.

While he was gone, Missy had found the sink plug and allowed the water to drain slowly. She beckoned for Danny to lower the towel. Raising it and her, Danny gently dabbed her skin dry without turning her directly.

Missy strolled from the towel to the plate and sat on it. She seductively crossed her legs and winked at the giant. She was pushing her luck now, trying to prove he was like the others. Danny simply smiled and pointed to the food. “Please eat up, girl. I want you strong again. I am glad you seem happier! You are very pretty.”

Missy genuinely blushed at the complement. Picking up a hunk of sandwich, she devoured it. She could hear the giant happily chuckling. As she grabbed a second hunk, she looked up and studied his face. He was younger than she expected, his face fresher than the other giants. That didn’t stop her from seeing every blotch and pimple on his mottled face though. She couldn’t miss it with everything as such distorted scales. His face was sweet and appeared kind.

Missy motioned for Danny to place his hand, palm up, next to the plate. Grabbing an olive, she sat down on the palm, hugging the olive to her chest. “Up” she requested and Danny brought her to his face.

Missy held out the olive, “Open your mouth, my giant. Let me feed this to you as thanks for saving me.”

Danny chuckled, covering his mouth with the other hand. He thought this was beyond great and savored her placing the olive between his lips. As they closed, she leaned over and kissed his top lip. “Thank you again. Is there anywhere I can sleep?”

Knowing his hands were greasy, Danny just smiled. “Yep! My girl Red will be happy to have a roommate.”

“You have another shrunken person?”

“I don’t know if ‘have’ is the right word. We play and I look after her. She is my friend. I hope you will be too some day.”

Missy smiled, “Keep it up, tall stuff, and I would be happy to count you as a friend. A shrimp like me needs all the friends she can get.”

“I’m going to slide you into my pocket for safe keeping if that’s ok. After I finsh my sandwich, I can get you to bed, and get me too!”

Missy nodded and Danny slipped her in his pocket. A few minutes later he had his fill and cleared the counter. As promised, he took her back to the room and placed her into one of the guest rooms of Red’s dollhouse. He laid down and dreamed of his new found world of Red and Yellow. His last thought before drifting off was “Darn, I forget to water Bob again today.”

Talia was impressed. That story really hung together well. She scooped up Ryan and kissed his head. “Thank you for sharing your wife with me. I know it is hard. Know that you are welcome to stay with us.”

Tiny Ryan found his voice, “No offense, but my son deserves a life at full size. You can’t provide this for him. That’s who I am focused on now.”

Talia placed him near his wife and she watched them embrace. She then turned her attention back to James. “That leaves one.”

“Yes,” said James, “She was the largest challenge, weren’t you Ms, Beth?” Beth smiled at James. “However, I believe you will be as excited at the outcome as I am.”

Talia, you will now be Beth’s provider and patron. While you are away, she will work in a provided studio. While you are here, you will provide for her every need.”

Talia could not believe her ears! Here was the tea party companion she truly sought. She flattened Beth against her chest, then nearly drowned her in kisses. Beth stroked Talia’s thumb, “Wow, I take that as you accept.”

Missy was less impressed, as her breasts were still visible through the knots. “It’s warmer than being in my bathing suit,” she tried.

“I was a cheerleader in high school,” replied Missy.

“I was a dancer for a local theatre troop. They would have left on their European tour by now,” stated Kristin.

“Would you dance for me? I would love to see you dance,” asked Danny hopefully, “If you don’t want to, that’s fine.”

Kristin walked over to Danny’s hand and sat on it. She dropped her new dress to the table and asked Danny’s Alexa to start Sara Baraellis’ Little Voices.

Danny patted her shoulder as she put on her dress. He was thrilled by the performance.

He scooped up both girls and kissed them. How about we go to a toy store and find you dresses.

Given his girls seemed similarly excited, he put on a vest and slipped them into an upper pocket so they can see.

Patting the pocket, he stared “Let’s go!”

She has long beautiful fingers and toes that she normally left unpainted, but she had already let Talia paint them in a lime green color. Beth stirred at Talia’s request and was amazed by the giant store around her. “Beth, what kind of tree do you think would be best for Amy?”

“How would you describe her?” Beth asked.

“She was smart and beautiful. She was confident and resilient. There was some sadness she carried with her, although I never learned what it was,” Talia responded thoughtfully.

“What about a willow? They are hauntingly beautiful and resilient. It will stand the test of time,” suggested Beth equally thoughtful, “Also, the bushy clusters it forms are home to many insect species. So it is almost like the tree is a mother to those insects.”
