His Dad always thought it was just the ramblings of a normal 8 year old boy, because pretty much every boy would love to be bigger than at least one adult, ANY adult. Austin's Dad is a very powerful executive in the computer company he owns, and since he is out of town so much because of his job he has a tendancy to give Austin pretty much anything he wants. A client had told him about the strange toy shop where very small people are available for purchase, and at first Austin's Dad thought the small people simply had to be very elaborate little robots. Since he didn't believe it his client brought his own son with him into the office one day and showed Austin's father the tiny little man he had just bought at the toy shop. He knew that Austin simply had to have one for himself, and so here they were. One million dollars for him was a very reasonable price to pay to see Austin so happy.

As Austin was watching the shrinking machine work, and the tiny human was getting smaller and smaller, he was becoming more and more excited. This little man would soon be his, and he couldn't wait to hold him in his hand for the first time. To actually hold a tiny living man in his fingers was something he had always wanted to do, and now he was going to get the chance. To be able to keep him in a cage on his dresser, and to be completely in charge of a fully grown adult who had to listen to whatever Austin told him was his dream come true. Austin didn't know or care who this person was, or what his life was all about. He was now being shrunk, and Austin loved the fact that he was able to choose how small he was going to be.

_____________________________________

When Austin first secured you to the velcro board you were sure you had to be in the middle of the most horrific nightmare ever. How could this 9-year-old boy be holding you in his hands and strapping you down so you could be reduced in size even more than you already had been? This whole senerio is so impossible you kept telling yourself you simply had to be on some sort of drug induced trip.

Then you saw that you were being placed in front of that evil machine again. And that's what that machine had to be. Simply evil. This is the machine that makes it possible for people to be owned by other people. This is the machine that makes it possible for a 9-year-old boy to be towering above you waiting for you to be small enough for him to be able to play with you like a toy. The machine and Mr. Franz both are just pure evil. How in the world could any amount of money be important enough to him to put your whole existance in the hands of a child? As the machine was pointed at you again and turned on the reality was made horribly real. You could actually feel yourself diminishing. The light eminating from the machine that was shrinking you made it hard to see much of anything else in the room. But Austin moved in a little closer just off to the right side of the light, and you could see the look in his eyes as he joyfully watched you becoming his.

When Mr. Franz finally stopped the machine you heard him say "Ok, Austin, he's all yours." The light died down as his shadow overtook you. Focusing your eyes from where the velcro board was propped up you realized you were too weak to scream as you found yourself looking at his feet covered by a pair of slightly oversized dingy white socks very quickly stepping toward you. You had no idea how incredibly small being three inches tall could make you feel. You were now so small you couldn't even reach up to the top of his socks. How in the world could you possibly ever escape this?

_________________________________


This was the moment Austin had waited for. He couldn't believe he was looking down towards the ground, and there at his feet was a tiny little man who he could take home with him. As Austin reached down to pick up the now smaller velcro board which the little man was strapped to he didn't notice that the small man was so scared he was on the verge of hyperventalating. Austin was too busy comparing how much bigger his own hand was than the whole body of this very tiny human. And he was wondering if three inches was really the right size. After all, his Dad would pay to shrink him more if he wanted, like maybe down to two inches. Or if he wanted one that was 6 inches instead he knew Mr. Franz probably wouldn't have any problem selling this little man to some other kid since he couldn't make him any bigger now that he was shrunk to this size.

_____________________________

As the velcro board you are strapped to is lifted up off the ground you want to close your eyes and simply close off this horrible world you have been unwantedly thrust into. But you are almost too scared NOT to look. Austin's hands look massive as one hand holds the board while the other hand comes toward you. He is holding the board so you are lying on your back as the thumb and forefinger of his right hand easily pulls the velcro strap off of your chest and drops it off to the side. Then the strap over your legs is lifted off of you, and the board is tilted so you start to slide straight down. You land on the soft surface of his open hand, and his thumb immediately pins you down. You look up at the giant, smiling face of the boy who now owns you. His warm breath moves over you, and in complete fear you try to break free of his grasp. His smile doesn't go away, and in fact he laughs slightly as you try to struggle in his fingers. He is actually enjoying the fact that you are afraid of him. His hand is warm and moist, and his fingers gently hold you a bit tighter.

____________________________

Austin turns to walk back over to where he left his shoes, only to find that his Dad has already walked into the room and picked them up. He holds his hand up to show the tiny man to his Dad. "Well, Austin, is that what you wanted?" his Dad asks.
1321.title: Sheer Joy, and Sheer Horror.

choices: My class at school for show & tell.
13211.content:
Austin told his dad that you were the perfect size. He said he would be able to use you in a war with his GI Joes. Mr. Franz laughed, while his dad reached over and happily messed up Austin's blond hair.

Mr. Franz picked up the small velcro board and handed it to Austin. "I think your payment has also bought you this. You may need this to strap him down occasionally," he said with a smile. "Cool," Austin yelled, and immediately strapped you back onto it.

Austin's dad laughed as he was still holding Austin's shoes, while Austin raced out the door of the shop in his socks to get in their SUV so he could examine his new little captive more closely. Mr. Franz told Austin's dad it was a pleasure to serve them, and if they ever needed another little man to please come back. They shook hands, and Austin's dad headed for the door.

Austin's dad stopped as he reached the door, and asked "Is there any chance that the shrinking isn't permanent? I mean, is there a danger of him growing back to normal size while he is in the custody of my son?" Mr. Franz assured him that was impossible. He explained, "The human body is made up mostly of water. Since it is a scientific fact that matter cannot be created nor destroyed the only way to shrink a human is to take water molecules in the body and convert them back to gases. So what the shrinking machine does is to break down some of the water molecules back into hydrogen and oxygen gases. When the gases are released the person shrinks. But there is no way to reverse the process. You would have to find a way to rejoin hydrogen and oxygen molecules and put them back into the body. So, there is no need to worry about that. He will always be three inches tall. That is, unless Austin decides he wants to bring him back and shrink him smaller. We can definitely accommadate that."

Austin's dad smiled as he left the shop and made his way to the SUV. He was leaving for a business trip tomorrow and would be gone for two weeks. He knew that he had just made Austin very happy. As he opened the door and got behind the steering wheel he saw that Austin was holding you in his open palm very close to his face examining him carefully. "Be careful that you don't sneeze and blow him off your hand" his father laughed. Austin started laughing at the thought of that so hard his breath nearly did knock you off his hand.

"You know, dad" Austin said as he strapped you back onto the velcro board, "now that he has been shrunk so small he is going to have to get used to spending time down by our feet." He put the board with you strapped to it on the floorboard of the car. The next thing you saw was the dirty bottom of his sock coming right down on top of you, covering nearly your entire body, with his toes resting on your shoulders and only your head sticking out. His dad laughed looking down at you under his foot, "Yeah, you're right, he will have to get used to spending time down by our feet."

Suddenly Austin got a huge grin on his face and he said to his dad, "I can't wait to show him to..."
13211.title: Going home

choices: An hour later he wants to play...
Austin invites his friend Cameron over...
132112.content:
You could not believe what you were hearing. This kid wants to take you to school with him and show you in your now shrunken state to a whole room full of 8 and 9 year old kids who would simply love to own a tiny person.

Fortunately, Austin's dad had the wisdom to say "You know, kiddo, I don't think that is such a great idea. He might get hurt, or even stolen. I think it would be best to keep him at home and show him only to a close circle of family and friends." The truth is that Austin's dad knew that everything about shrinking another person is completely illegal, and he just didn't want to be caught.

Austin kept you velcroed down and under his foot the entire ride home. They pulled into the driveway and Austin jumped out of the SUV and rather roughly grabbed the little board you were velcroed to off the floor and ran as fast as he could up the front porch and into the house. His arms were swinging so fast as he was running the only thing you could do was to close your eyes and hope this ended soon.

He was obviously fully expecting to come home with a doll sized person, because he had everything ready for you in his room. He walked over to his desk and put the velcro board you were strapped to down. All over his desk were typical things you would find in a 9 year old's room, like action figures of various types and sizes, crayons, dirty plates and cups, and even a dirty sock hanging off the edge. The thing your eyes were immediately drawn to, though, was the plastic and metal small animal cage in the corner. You just knew it was meant for you. You could tell immediately that escape would be virtually impossible, because there was only one small plastic door that snapped shut on the very top of the cage. It would be impossible for you to climb to it, even if he left it open all the time.

He reached for one of his Star Wars figures which was almost exactly the same size as you. It was the figure of young Anakin, and was wearing a small fabric robe. Austin pulled the robe off the figure, and then his giant fingers were pulling the velcro straps off of you. He told you he wanted you to take off all of your clothes except your underwear. You told him there was no way you were going to do that, but Austin knew very well who was in charge and said that if you wouldn't do it he would rip them off of you. It was very clear that this was an incredibly spoiled-rotten kid who was used to getting his way. You wouldn't get any sympathy from him.

In a few moments you were standing on the desk in front of him with your pants, shirt, shoes and socks lying in front of you. He smiled as his hand closed around you, and then he easily dressed you in the robe of the Star Wars figure. Then he open the little plastic door on the cage, and lowered you in, snapping the door shut over your head.

Then he placed his open palm along the edge of his desk, and swept your tiny clothes into his hand. It made you feel very helpless as you watched Austin drop them into his Power Rangers garbage can as he walked out the door. Your clothes...the last link you had to any sort of normal life, simply tossed into the trash. Then he shut off the bedroom light, leaving you in the dark.
132112.title: A new home, and a new wardrobe.

choices: You run as fast as you can and try to hide.
He just crushed an action figure under his foot.  You don't move.
1321121.content:
You spend some time walking around the cage to see if there are any weak spots you might escape from. After all, you are a fully grown, intelligent human being. These cages are made to keep hamsters in. A hamster wouldn't be smart enough to figure out how to escape, but certain you could.

The cage is made of plastic with a couple of areas of metal bars. You try as hard as you can to bend the bars or pry them loose, but it's completely hopeless. The only door is at the very top, and it's impossible to reach. There are some round openings for tubes to be connected to if they want to expand the cage, but they have been plugged with round plastic caps which won't budge. You finally just sit on the floor and face the fact that there is no escape. Austin has picked the perfect cage to keep a small three inch man in.

The bedroom door opens and the next thing you know you are engulfed in light as he turns on the bedroom light. He comes immediately over to his desk, slides out the chair and sits down. He doesn't even look at or acknowledge you as he opens the desk drawer and takes out a couple of GI Joe action figures and a couple of Star Wars figures. He also grabs a few accessories out of the drawer, like guns and light sabers and extra robes, just like the one he has dressed you in. He takes everything and puts it down on the floor, and then comes for you. He snaps open the plastic door on the top of the cage, and then his gigantic hand comes through the opening and comes down right on top of you. As his warm, soft, moist fingers close around you it makes you feel incredibly small, insignificant, and helpless. You are in the possession of a boy, a mere child. This is just so wrong.

He walks to the corner of his room and drags over a large plastic bin full of legos to where he has put his action figures. Then he lays down on his stomach, propping himself up on his elbows, and puts you down by the other figures. You lay there quietly as he begins to build a lego fortress to use while playing with you and his action figures.

After about five minutes you hear a woman's voice call him, and assume it must be his mother. He screams out "WHAT" so loudly that at your size it feels like it will blow you across the room. You hear her say he needs to come downstairs and pick up the mess he made. Austin is obviously annoyed. His face is filled with disgust as he softly says out loud to himself "Maybe I should have her shrunk, too." Just knowing that this kid would even THINK about shrinking his own Mom makes you realize that he is incredibly spoiled and selfish. He gets up and yells out "COMING" and then stops and looks down at you. He lifts his foot and you see the bottom of his dirty white sock once again coming down towards you, only this time it comes down on the GI Joe figure right next to you. He puts his full weight on it, and you can hear some of the plastic breaking beneath his foot. "If you move from that spot, you'll be under my foot" he says, then slightly smiles and walks out the door.
1321121.title: You're just a toy

choices: His dad comes in to say goodnight.
He falls asleep, and you spend the whole night taped to his foot.
13211211.content:
You think about it for just a moment, and realize that this may be your only chance of ever getting away. So you make a mad dash towards the hallway. For being only three inches tall you are definitely moving quickly and you reach the door and run as fast as you can down the hall towards an open bedroom door.

The moment you enter the gigantic room you know you are in Austin's parent's room. Your first instinct is to get hidden as quickly as you can, so you run for cover under the bed. The moment you reach "safety" you hear Austin coming up the stairs and go into his room. When he discovers you are gone you hear him say "I WILL find you, and when I do you WILL be in trouble."

There is nothing to hide behind under Austin's parent's bed, so you go as far back under the bed as you can and cower against the wall. You know he is going to search and search until he finds you, but you just hope that he doesn't start looking in his mom & dad's room. You can hear him moving things around in his room, and turning over boxes with toys in them. Then you start to hear what sounds like a remote control car driving around his room. You start to wonder if maybe he has actually given up looking for you and moved on to playing with another toy.

You can hear the car driving around in his room for about five minutes or so, and you are just starting to get up the courage to maybe try to move to a safer hiding place. Then suddenly you hear the remote control car coming down the hall towards the room you are hiding in. From where you are under the bed you can see the door to the bedroom, and you see a large, black, plastic remote control car come rolling through the door. The car rolls towards the closet and stops in front of the door. Then it backs up and rolls towards a pair of shoes in the middle of the floor. It rolls around the shoes, almost like it can see them. You wonder how Austin is controlling the car when he isn't even in the room.

Then the car turns and comes towards the bed, and as it is approaching it becomes clear how the car knows where to go. There is a camera lens on the front of the car, and Austin is controlling it from his room, but is able to see where the car is going through that lens. As the car comes under the bed the headlights of the car turn on, and you know you are about to be found. The car heads towards the wall about three feet from where you are, and then turns directly towards you and the lights shine right on you. You can feel the pounding of the floor as Austin is running towards his parent's room, and then you see his giant feet wearing the dirty white socks coming through the door and heading right for where you are. He gets down on his knees and you see his huge face looking under the bed. There is a round black plastic thing covering his left eye, and it is held there with an elastic strap around his head. It's the little receiver he is using to see what the camera lens on the remote control car is seeing.

You can't help but think what a terrifying sight it is seeing a giant 9-year-old boy reaching for you. His open hand swiftly approaches you, and you instinctively try to run from it, but you quickly find yourself surrounded by his giant fingers and being picked up.

His hand drops to his side as he is walking back to his room, and since he is holding you with your back against his forefinger and his thumb over your chest you are virtually upside down. You tilt your head and see his feet walking towards the room, and wonder if you are about to be crushed under one of them like the GI Joe was a few minutes ago.

He goes over to his desk, opens the drawer and takes out a roll of Scotch tape. Then he sits on his bed and looks down at you in his hand. "I guess I gotta show you what happens when you don't do what I tell you to do" he says. Then he sets you down on the bed next to him, just long enough to pull a piece of tape about a foot long out of the tape dispenser. Then he picks you up and presses you face first onto the bottom of his right foot with your feet down by his heel and your head just below the ball of his foot. Then he winds the tape around you and his foot strapping you to it. The smell of his dirty sock is a bit overwhelming. Then he grabs his TV remote, lays on his bed with his feet crossed, and settles in to watch some cartoons.
13211211.title: The Remote Control Spy Car

13212.content:
"Well, Austin, is that what you wanted?" his Dad asks.

Austin feels his new toy in his hand. He smiles, so enjoying the feel. He looks down at the little man, struggling helplessly in his fist. The little man's head and shoulders are outside of the top of his fist and his feet are coming out the bottom. Austin realizes he wants him a little smaller...this will work best if he can hold him totally in his fist.

'I think I want him one inch smaller,' Austin tells his Da. 'If that is ok?'

His dad looks to Mr. Franz

-

You can't believe it - smaller!!?? You wrestle in his fist and cry out but no one seems to be paying any attention to you. Except at times Austin, and you don't want his attention. You hear Mr. Franz say of course it would be ok, and no charge for such good customers. The next think you know you are back on the velcro and being made even smaller. You had no idea the world could still look so much larger.

-

Austin approaches his little man when the next round is done. He reaches down and soon has the toy man totally encased in his fist, just the tiny little head sticking out. Yes, he thinks, this is it. This is now perfect. He looks down at the little head and smiles, and blows on him a little bit. MINE he keeps thinking, MINE.

-

You find yourself exhausted and totally wrapped in Austin's fist. Even if you had the energy, you would not be able to move anything except to slightly turn your head. You still cannot believe you are small enough to be held in a fist but there is no denying it. You are two inches tall and there is no return.

You see Austin look down at you and smile possessively. Then for fun he blows on you. You can't believe how strong the breath is. He could knock you over with his breath! Then his Dad comes up to him again and asks if everything is ok. 'He's perfect!' Austin says and lowers his hand to his side as they talk. You hang by his side, unable to move, forgotten, as the three giants talk. You never knew it was possible to feel so helpless.

-

Austin's dad and Mr. Franz finish their transaction. 'We need to go, Son,' Austin's dad says and leads him out of the store. Austin holds tight to his new toy, so excited to have this new toy, this tiny live man, who is His to own and control. He can't wait to get home.

The two get in the car. 'Are you happy, Son?' Austin's Dad asks?

"Yes Sir thank You! He's all mine.'

Austin's dad starts the car. 'I think we should go get a cage to keep him in, and some other things. Want to go to the pet store?'
13212.title: In a fist

choices: A quick stop in the bathroom
132121.content:
Austin keeps you in his fist the whole ride to the pet store. Sometimes he looks down at you, sometimes he looks out the window or talks to his dad. You are unnerved when he looks down at you - he is so huge, you are held so tight, and the look on his face is so possessive. Not mean, just possessive. When he looks away, you look around as much as you can from his hand. If you thought Austin was big, it is nothing compared to his dad, who is almost twice his size. Your stomach lurches when you see the man, so enormous, not even that much older than you, but so different, so huge. You feel the car come to a stop, and you see the giant father look down at you.

-

Austin's dad turns off the car and looks at Austin's fist. 'Ready to get what we need?'

Austin grins excitedly.

'I don't think you should carry him that way in the mall,' Austin's dad says. 'We don't want anyone to see him.'

'Ok - what should we do?" Austin asks.

-

From Austin's fist you see his dad look down at you again. You hear the giant say: 'Let me take him. I can put him in my suit pocket, and we can maybe use him inside to see which cage you want.' He pats his jacket. 'He'll be safe in here.'

You hear Austin agree and his fingers open. You are now laying in his palm. The air feels good, all around you where his fingers were holding your body, but before you know it, a massive hand comes for you. It is so much bigger than Austin's. You want to run, but there is no where to go. The next thing you know, giant fingers have picked you up and you are hanging from them. You rise, so high in the air. And find yourself hanging helpless in front of Austin's dad's face.

'Isn't he cool?' you hear Austin say, though all you can see is his dad's face, not even all of it, just his giant nose and eyes. You see a glimmer in the eyes and then, as you drop down a bit, you see the giant mouth as it opens and says 'yes he really is.' The cavern is huge and the tongue and teeth terrifying. Then yuo are lowered some more, helpless, and you see from the corner of your eye his dad open his jacket, He moves you to the inside pocket and drops you in. You slide to the bottom and then feel him pat you from the outside as you hear him say to Austin 'He'll be safe in here.'
132121.title: To the pet store

1321211.content:
Austin races ahead of his dad, so excited to get to the pet store. He is thinking of all kinds of things he can get for his new live toy. His father walks quickly behind him, happy to see his son so excited. He smiles to himself, glad that he can do something so positive for his son. He also still finds it hard to believe he has a live man in his jacket pocket, though he knows it to be true as he just held the little man in his hand. The feeling was incredible; he suddenly understood why Austin so wanted this little live toy. He fights the temptation to reach in and grab the little man. There will be plenty of time for that later, and he doesn’t want anyone in the mall to see the little guy.

--

You sit at the bottom of the giant’s jacket pocket, trying to catch your breath. You had a bit of a panic attack when the giant hand dropped you in. It was your first time ‘alone’ and not in a hand in a while, and the situation overwhelmed you. You can feel the giant moving, and you can smell the coat fabric, mints and a hint of the giant himself in the pocket. You keep thinking, hoping this will end. Way down deep, you are afraid you know it won’t. Which gives you the panic attack all over again.

Soon, you feel the giant slow, then stop. From deep in the pocket, you hear the giant ask, ‘What do you think, Austin? Do you like this one?’

-

Austin and his dad have stopped in front of a large shelf filled with various cages. Some have metal bars, some have mesh, some are plastic. They are various sizes as well. Austin is looking at a large cage with metal bars. He is thinking intently.

‘Well, I think this cage is too big. He could probably squeeze out between these bars. And, well, I’ve always had in my mind it would be a metal cage, I like that more than the plastic ones, I think. Although those habitrails are cool! But with a cage like this one, something might get in as well. I don’t want a bug or spider to get him.’

Austin’s dad pats his son on the head, impressed with how intelligent he is and the thought he has put into it. He’ll be a good owner for his new pet. He looks at Austin.

‘Well, son, we could get one of those metal ones like you like, but with the mesh around it. He could not get out, nothing can get in, and you can see in and reach in when you open the top. We can get a habitrail too, for something different to use when you feel like it. He ought to have a wheel to run on anyway, you want him to exercise and stay in shape.’

‘Wow both that would be awesome, Dad!’ Austin say excitedly. ‘Thanks! Could we try him out??’

Austin’s dad looks around and sees there is no one in the back of the store.

‘Sure – you can see which size you like best.’

-

You cannot believe what you are hearing from the pocket. They really are buying a cage to keep you in. Then, you cry out when the jacket moves quickly and the giant fingers come in. Before you can even move, you and hanging from the giant finger and thumb again, and are lifted out.

You emerge from the pocket and are so overwhelmed… by the size of Austin’s dad, by Austin standing next to him, young but still so enormous, and the size of the store and it’s contents.

‘Here you are, Son,’ the giant says as you move, hanging helplessly. Austin’s own giant hand comes up and wraps entirely around you. You are back in your old position, in his fist, your head sticking out. This seems to be the way he likes to hold you.

His hand then moves. You see it approaching a cage and you start to squirm in his hand. You don’t want to go in there!

--

Austin opens the side door on one of the metal cages with bars and moves his hand inside. He releases the little man, takes his hand out, and closes the door and latches it with his fingers. He looks at the little man, so small, in the cage. The cage is about 6” high by 8” long.

‘I know I need to get the other one, I just wanted to see him in it,’ Austin says. His dad smiles, also enjoying the view.

-

You start to panic again, from inside the cage. The view takes your breath away, these two huge giants looking at You from above the cage. You want to cry out for help, but you cant seem to find your voice.

You jump back when you see movement, huge movement, Austin’s dad has leaned down and his face is right outside the side of the cage, looking in. His giant mouth opens and he speaks.

‘You know, Austin, I like him in this one too. Why don’t we get one of each, all three, and then you can use them for different purposes.’

Austin nods, looking at you. He then hugs his dad. ‘Thanks so much.’

You see his dad’s giant hand unlock the cage door and you run to the back as it comes inside. Both Austin and his dad laugh, as his giant hand easily wraps around you. You disappear totally inside it, and soon find yourself in his pocket again.

“Let’s get the rest of the things and head home so you can play with him’
1321211.title: Trying out a cage

choices: Austin takes you to dinner with his dad
13212111.content:
Trapped in the pocket of the giant dad, you can hear Austin and his father purchasing things. Your mind reels, wondering what they could be getting. Soon, you hear them get back in the car. As the giant settles, you begin to smell his masculine scent as you hear Austin ask for 'his toy'. Giant fingers enter the pocket. There is nothing you can do. Soon you find yourself hanging in front of Austin's face, a wide grin in front of you. You almost wet yourself, even Austin is so huge and the look in his eyes so happy and possessive. Then you find yourself held again in his fist, unable to move. He holds you so that even your face is almost inside the fist. You have to keep your chin up to be able to see and breathe. Austin talks excitedly to his father, the giant father laughing, as they drive home.

As the car parks, you see giant movement. Held in Austin's fist, you hear the father talk to him as they face one another.

'Just a reminder, son, this is just between us. None of your friends can know. No one can know, or he will have to go back. We both will take care of him. He's our little secret.'

'Yes Dad' Austin says, and they get out of the car. You can do nothing.

-

Austin races from the car to his room, his father walking behind, carrying the packages. He can feel the little man trying to squirm in his fist. It makes Austin smile.

He enters his room and waits for his father to come. When his father arrives, he watches his father take the cages out of the bags. There is a large table set up on one side of the room/ All three cages are places side by side.

'Which do you want to try out first?"

Austin moves to the steel cage. He opens the top and lowers his fist inside.

-

You feel yourself lowered back into the cage. While it is a relief to be free of the fist, when the fingers unfurl, you have a hard time catching your breath, being back in the cage, seeing the two giant figures outside. Huge fingers close and lock the cage. You are effectively trapped inside.

;Good choice, Son. Just remember if you are not around, you probably want to leave him in this one' the giant father says, pointing toward the plastic habitat. 'We can set each one up for him, though.' You watch as they begin to take water bottles, food bins, and various other toys from the bags.
13212111.title: Buying accessories

14.content:
your cosen ones are

a 5'11 400 pound women 1

very fat little girl 2

big big school teacher 3


very fat big hill billy womon 4
14.title: chose

142.content: Well how about some more options or we can stay with the very fat little girl 2
142.title: More options

choices: Follow the collector going after the tiny couples family.
Readers tiny Bob and tiny Debra choice?
1422.content:
This is a slight change from the original story, and I hope the owner does not mind.

...................

Bob Westly and his long time wife Debra Westly are applying to Mr. Franz Exotic Toy Company. They read an ad on some obscure website requesting models for a new line of dolls, both genders, couples, families, adults, teens, and even children are encouraged to apply. didnt buy all your accesseries.You were sure
she would rip all your clothes off any min-
ute though.You lay there so mad,resenting
that permanant smile painted on your face.
I was just a nobody.."Hell, I am a nobody..
as you reminance of your life as the living.
"Wow, you think again ..pondering the chubby
little girls recital of your grand profile
off the box.Suddenly that chubby little girl
whom you almost could emphathsize with,grabs
you off her bed and rips your head off.
Your not dead being rubber and all.But you
wished you were."Mabe they will exchange me
too"!You say as you think about Bob.With
your head floating in the fishbowl.Her rich
aunt,Mr Franz...and again Bob.You thought
about Mr crackerjack...and what he would do.
143.title: Just then that familiar bell rings

144.content: Since the person was not nice enough to allow for other choices than just women, let's keep going.
144.title: Other

choices: The other tiny person is a 6 to 8 year old white girl, with blond hair?
The other tiny person is a young white boy?
You choose who the other tiny person is?
1443.content:
Bob looks up, still trapped inside of his hazy prison to see a nice-looking, giant 11-year-old white boy, with short lit-brown hair, and blue eyes looking back at him, “I want him too!” Bob hears the boy saying.

Bob then heard the boy saying, “Could we make him slightly smaller, around six inches tall like the others?”

“Sure,” the old man tells him, “Anything for you.”

Bob then felt the container that he is in being lifted up, and placed on the table. Still trapped in his plastic cage, Bob could see the lights of this device activating again. He then passed out, as his body begins to shrink down to around six inches tall.

As Mr. Franz continues to shrink Bob, 11-year-old Jacob watches eagerly from nearby. Jacob is alone for right now, but Jacob’s father Vito Corleone does know what his son is doing. Jacob’s driver and personnel bodyguard Tony is currently standing outside the door. Before we go on any further, let me give you some background on Jacob. Jacob is the spoiled rotten kid of a major American crime boss. Jacob’s father Vito owns the city, the police force on all levels, and nearly everything else in the state. He even owns part of Mr. Franz business, and he allows Mr. Franz unique pet store to continue unmolested. On this day, Jacob has decided that he wants some unusual pets for his 11th birthday. Therefore, on this day Vito went from being a business partner to being one of Mr. Franz biggest customers. Vito is literally giving Mr. Franz millions of dollars for anything Jacob wants. Therefore, Mr. Franz eagerly did whatever Jacob wanted.

Mr. Franz finally finishes the shrinking process of Bob, and Bob is now 6 inches tall. Bob is now dressed in a smaller, white toga that covers most of his great, 38-year-old body. Mr. Franz then puts the still unconscious Bob into a new six-inch tall container for safekeeping. Mr. Franz then asks Jacob “Is there is anything else that I can do for you?”

Jacob tells him, “Yes! I would like a smaller, portable shrinking device for myself.”

Reluctantly, Mr. Franz gives in and hands Jacob a portable device. Mr. Franz knows that if Jacob does anything stupid that his father will easily clean up the mess. Jacob then leaves Mr. Franz pet shop with two containers in hand, and the tiny people inside these containers are all around 5 to 6 inches tall. Jacob also has a portable shrinking device with him that he will use. Jacob is fussy, he likes his tiny people to be 4 ½ to 6 inches tall depending on the human pets gender and age. Tony drives Jacob home, and the first thing that happens when he gets home is that Jacob goes to his huge bedroom with his two pets, and the device in hand, locks the door, and gets ready to have some fun…
1443.title: Bob is chosen by 11-year-old Jacob!

info.brief_description: Attack of the Puppet People! You are sold as a child's toy! Feel free to add!
info.description:
You apply for employment at a strange toy store run by a Mr. Franz. You are soon shrunk and sold as a toy.

[I may sometimes feel the need to delete chapters to proceed the story where I have it layed out in my head. This is by no way saying I don't apreciate your input into the story. Just you have to break a few eggs to egg a house. LOL Other than that feel free to add!]
